Classes in com.google.code.rees.scope.util.monitor with type parameters of type Timeoutable
 class BasicTimeoutMonitor<T extends Timeoutable<T>>
          This is a Serializable implementation of the TimeoutMonitor interface.
 class BladeRunner<T extends Timeoutable<T>>
          A basic implementation of TimeoutRunner inspired by Harrison Ford.
 class ScheduledExecutorTimeoutMonitor<T extends Timeoutable<T>>
          An implementation of the TimeoutMonitor that makes use of a ScheduledExecutorService.
 interface Timeoutable<T extends Timeoutable<T>>
          This interface can be used in conjunction with a TimeoutMonitor to provide a simple timeout mechanism
 interface TimeoutMonitor<T extends Timeoutable<T>>
          This interface works in conjunction with the Timeoutable interface to provide a simple timeout mechanism
 interface TimeoutMonitorFactory<T extends Timeoutable<T>>
          A factory interface for producing TimeoutMonitors
 interface TimeoutRunner<T extends Timeoutable<T>>
          A handy runnable interface whose implementations should have a Runnable.run() method that will be executed periodically to perform monitoring of its Timeoutable.
